summary: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.
cast: Ethan Hawke|Julie Delpy|Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick|Jennifer Prior|Charlotte Prior|Xenia Kalogeropoulou|Walter Lassally|Ariane Labed|Yiannis Papadopoulos|Athina Rachel Tsangari|Panos Koronis|Enrico Focardi|Manolis Goussias|Anouk Servera|Yota Argyropoulou|Serafeim Radis|Tety Kalafati|John Sloss
title: Antes del anochecer
